20110115010032.000|20110115010035.000|CC1|THE WAIST DOWN, HER BEDROOM     
20110115010035.000|20110115010035.000|CC1|RANSACKED.

20110115010046.000|20110115010048.000|CC1|THROWN INTO A NEARBY LAKE.

20110115010106.000|20110115010108.000|CC1|RAPE AND ROBBERY, THEN HEAD OUT 
20110115010108.000|20110115010120.000|CC1|TO WATCH A BASKETBALL GAME?     
20110115010120.000|20110115010125.000|CC1|>> INVESTIGATORS SAY BARTLETT

20110115010126.000|20110115010127.000|CC1|BURGLARY AND RAPE.

20110115010130.000|20110115010131.000|CC1|STAB WOUNDS.

20110115010134.000|20110115010135.000|CC1|BARTLETT ADMITTED TO KILLING HIS
20110115010135.000|20110115010137.000|CC1|WIFE OF 30 YEARS.

20110115010139.000|20110115010140.000|CC1|STABBED HIS WIFE REPEATEDLY.    
20110115010140.000|20110115010142.000|CC1|>> THEN THEY SAY HE WENT        
20110115010142.000|20110115010143.000|CC1|SHOPPING, TO A BASKETBALL GAME, 
20110115010143.000|20110115010145.000|CC1|AND BACK HOME TO CALL 911.

20110115010547.000|20110115010551.000|CC1|HUSBAND, 58-YEAR-OLD REGINALD

20110115010553.000|20110115010555.000|CC1|HER, REMOVED HER CLOTHES,

20110115010604.000|20110115010606.000|CC1|>> WE ARE TAKING YOUR CALLS     
20110115010606.000|20110115010608.000|CC1|LIVE.                           
20110115010608.000|20110115010611.000|CC1|OUT TO ELLIE JOSTAD, CHIEF

20110115010616.000|20110115010618.000|CC1|ACCORDING TO POLICE TO STAGE THE
20110115010618.000|20110115010619.000|CC1|SCENE.

20110115010620.000|20110115010621.000|CC1|WHEN THEY GOT THERE.            
20110115010621.000|20110115010621.000|CC1|>> SURE.                        
20110115010621.000|20110115010623.000|CC1|FIRST OF ALL, HER BODY, SHE WAS 
20110115010623.000|20110115010624.000|CC1|LYING FACE-UP.                  
20110115010624.000|20110115010626.000|CC1|HE TOLD POLICE HE HAD PULLED HER
20110115010626.000|20110115010627.000|CC1|SHIRT UP, UP OVER HER BREASTS.  
20110115010627.000|20110115010629.000|CC1|HE TOOK HER PANTS OFF, HE TOOK  
20110115010629.000|20110115010630.000|CC1|HER UNDERWEAR OFF.              
20110115010630.000|20110115010632.000|CC1|HE EVEN TOOK THE LEG BRACE OFF, 
20110115010632.000|20110115010633.000|CC1|SHE HAD POLIO AS A CHILD, SHE   
20110115010633.000|20110115010634.000|CC1|NEEDS IT TO WALK.               
20110115010634.000|20110115010635.000|CC1|HE TOOK THAT OFF AS WELL.       
20110115010635.000|20110115010636.000|CC1|HE DUMPED A COUPLE DRAWERS OUT  
20110115010636.000|20110115010638.000|CC1|TO MAKE IT LOOK LIKE THERE HAD  
20110115010638.000|20110115010639.000|CC1|BEEN A ROBBERY.                 
20110115010639.000|20110115010641.000|CC1|HE EVEN STREW ITEMS AROUND THE  
20110115010641.000|20110115010641.000|CC1|HOUSE.

20110115010656.000|20110115010659.000|CC1|LONG TIME FAN.                  
20110115010659.000|20110115010700.000|CC1|I'M WONDERING HOW HE MADE IT    
20110115010700.000|20110115010703.000|CC1|LOOK LIKE A BREAK-IN.           
20110115010703.000|20110115010703.000|CC1|>> GOOD QUESTION.               
20110115010703.000|20110115010706.000|CC1|WHAT DO WE KNOW, NICOLE PARTIN? 
20110115010706.000|20110115010707.000|CC1|IT WAS DEFINITELY SET UP TO LOOK
20110115010707.000|20110115010709.000|CC1|LIKE THE HOME HAD BEEN          
20110115010709.000|20110115010710.000|CC1|RANSACKED, THINGS HAD BEEN      
20110115010710.000|20110115010711.000|CC1|STOLEN.                         
20110115010711.000|20110115010713.000|CC1|IT WAS SET UP TO LOOK LIKE SHE  
20110115010713.000|20110115010714.000|CC1|HAD BEEN ATTACKED IN HER

20110115010716.000|20110115010717.000|CC1|GETTING READY FOR BED, HER      
20110115010717.000|20110115010719.000|CC1|CLOTHES HAD BEEN RIPPED OFF OF  
20110115010719.000|20110115010722.000|CC1|HER, THE ROOM WAS RANSACKED.    
20110115010722.000|20110115010725.000|CC1|HIS COMPUTER WAS TAKEN, BUT     
20110115010725.000|20110115010727.000|CC1|HERE'S THE THING.

20110115010730.000|20110115010731.000|CC1|NICOLE PARTIN.                  
20110115010731.000|20110115010733.000|CC1|>> THAT'S RIGHT, NANCY.         
20110115010733.000|20110115010735.000|CC1|HE DID TELL AUTHORITIES THAT HE 
20110115010735.000|20110115010736.000|CC1|HAD EMPTIED SEVERAL DRAWERS OUT 
20110115010736.000|20110115010737.000|CC1|ON TO THE FLOOR MAKING IT APPEAR
